visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and include configurations for chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a background color and specific margins for better visual appeal. The title and axis labels are styled with custom colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The data series represents monthly rainfall data, with a custom color applied to the series. Additionally, the legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart presentation.
